narrative.title: Deutsches Afrikakorps - 1941Q3

q3_1941_operations: July-August: Consolidation after Operation Battleaxe defeat
September: Preparation for Operation Crusader defense
situation.command_changes: Rommel promoted to General der Panzertruppe on 1 July 1941. Von Ravenstein assumes command of 21. Panzer.
situation.force_buildup: DAK at peak strength with two full Panzer divisions. 90. leichte Division forming separately under Panzergruppe Afrika.
situation.strategic_situation: Static operations dominate Q3. British building up for Operation Crusader (November). DAK preparing defensive positions.

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
